title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin notes that the Miami Heat are going to need more contributions than just forward Jimmy Butler going full-on superhero. Also, Colin sees a fast and furious transformation happening in Los Angeles as new USC head football coach Lincoln Riley continues to stockpile elite transfers for the once-dormant Trojans. Plus, now faced with a state resource disadvantage (compared to the rich state of Texas), Alabama head football coach Nick Saban is getting chirpy and salty at the prospect of being nudged from the mountaintop of college football.  And later, Sports Illustrated senior writer Chris Mannix stops by to discuss the ongoing Conference Finals. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
